Question: Cipia Vision Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Cipia Vision Ltd.

Product: Cabin Sense

- Nvidia-based in-cabin automotive solution
- Includes driver and occupancy monitoring
- Expected to enter serial production in 2024
- Can be integrated into various automotive computing platforms
- Specifically designed to work with standalone ECUs, ADAS, and IVI domain controllers
- Utilizes Nvidia DRIVE Orin SoC, delivering 254 trillion operations per second
- Supports in-cabin applications and enables highly automated and autonomous driving capabilities
- Offers Cabin Sense embedded evaluation kit
- Provides intelligent sensing solutions using edge-based computer vision and AI for enhanced mobility experiences
Summary_cn:
西皮亚眼科有限公司

产品：Cabin Sense

- 基于Nvidia的汽车舱内解决方案
- 包括驾驶员和乘客监测
- 预计于2024年开始批量生产
- 可与各种汽车计算平台集成
- 特别设计以与独立电控单元(ECUs)、ADAS和IVI域控制器一起工作
- 使用Nvidia DRIVE Orin SoC，每秒传输254万亿次操作
- 支持舱内应用程序，实现高度自动化和自主驾驶能力
- 提供Cabin Sense嵌入式评估套件
- 提供基于边缘计算视觉和人工智能的智能感应解决方案，以提升出行体验
